title: Did He Really Say That? (Ep 1679)
description:
The democrats melted down yesterday. In this episode, I address the most outrageous comments about January 6th and I use video clips to show their hypocrisy about “insurrections.” 

News Picks:


The NCAA recognizes basic science and equates natural immunity from infection with “fully vaccinated.” 

“Experts” finally acknowledge that masks aren’t working. 

Alternative social media platforms are seeing an explosion in growth after twitter doubles down on censorship.


What do higher interest rates mean for you?
